title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.14 - Approval, review and revocation of permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-7.14 - Approval, review and revocation of permits

State Regulations
(a) Permits for signs within the park shall
be signed by the executive director of the commission. (b) All permitted signs shall be erected and
maintained in accordance with the representations contained in the application
and with the provisions of the permit. (c) All permits issued or deemed to be issued
shall be subject to review and shall be revocable for cause at any
time. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-7.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
